about.title: About Me
about.content:
I’m an M.Sc. Computer Science graduate passionate about building impactful software. Beyond academics, I expand my skills through hands-on coding and practical projects.

Curious and driven, I am ready to deliver purpose-driven code as a professional developer.

achievements.title: University 3rd Rank
achievements.description: Awarded 3rd place across the entire B.Sc. Computer Science programme for consistent academic excellence and high cumulative GPA.

achievements.title: Academic 2nd Rank
achievements.description: Secured the 2nd highest academic rank in the B.Sc. Computer Science batch for the 2021–2022 academic year.

achievements.title: Certificate of Excellence
achievements.description: Recognised with a Certificate of Excellence by the Computer Society of India for strong performance in a national-level programming competition (Aug 2021).
